Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: Good quality food, nice location, clean and hygienic place. Very respectful staff, especially Kavita, who gave us a beautiful surprise.

Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: Incredibly delicious. A little on the expensive side but the tastiest Indian food I've had so far this year, across the US and Europe! Bathroom was completely spotless - honestly amazing. Beautiful decor, would definitely be a place to take …

Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: There are many Indian restaurants in Luxemborg, and every once in a while, even the best ones disappoint with there food! Bombay inn has not disappointed even once! We have referred our friends and they have said the same as well. It is …

Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: Easily the best restaurant in Belval. Super tasty food and extremely nice and attentive service. Big recommendation from my side!

Name: Bombay inn

Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: The food was delicious. The paneer korma was very tasty and creamy! The paneer was also soft and good. The garlic naan and cheese naan were also very good. All in all it was a very good experience. :)

Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: One of the best Indian restaurants I ever tried. Amazing traditional dishes, we've tried the Tikka massala and the vindaloo and they both were a blast! Highly recommended of you are nearby. Even with covid restrictions, the restorant is still open for take-away.

Name: Bombay inn

Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: First time in this restaurant for lunch and honestly i am very satisfied ! The food is so delicious, very generous and cheap and the staff is super nice, warm and welcoming.  The lunch menu (11am to 2pm i guess) costs 11.50 € it had entree, …

Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: Food was below average. Main issue was when we asked for parcel. Person came with boxes and said you can pack the food. When I said no he started packing on the table itself. When we asked he gave non sense reasons and didn't even apologize. So much of attitude.

Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: We ordered 1 chicken daiwala, 1 paneer korma and 2 cheese naan. Daiwala and Korma had exactly the same flavour (cream flavour), daiwala was just a bit acid due to the yoghurt. Both were FULL of cream with almost no spices or flavour. Paneer …

Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: Went to experience south Indian dish. Tried Idly-Dosa platter (only item in veg south indian), not good taste, chutneys not even close to ones you get in Sarvana bhawan. Chicken65 was very blend compared to other Indian-Nepalese restaurants.  Only saving grace were Chicken momos and good ambience. Lot needed for improvement.

Name: Bombay inn
Review Text: Very disappointed. I've ordered a couple of South Indian dishes and was surprised that it's not even close to what it's supposed to look and taste like. Moreover, they don't even match the description of the dish mentioned on the menu. When asked, the chef's response was that's how it's done. And description was a technical error.
